name: Fort Cacti
description:
Mr. Moose is an exterminator in the town Fort Cacti, overrun by cacti.

Help Mr. Moose destroy all of them and free Fort Cacti. Help the llamas and, don't forget, the citizens need you.

Created with blender and Unity 2020.3.25f1

Start date: Feb 8, 2022

End date: Jun 6, 2022
